    • loadReviews

      public void loadReviews​(java.lang.String filePath, int realClass)
      Description copied from class: assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Loads reviews from a given path. If the given path is a .txt file, then a single review is loaded. Otherwise, if the path is a folder, all reviews in it are loaded.
      Specified by:
      loadReviews in class assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file (or folder) containing the review(sentimentModel).
      realClass - The real class of the review (0 = Negative, 1 = Positive 2 = Unknown).

    • putInId

      public void putInId()

    • readReview

      public assignment2.MovieReview readReview​(java.lang.String reviewFilePath, int realClass)
      Description copied from class: assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Reads a single review file and returns it as a MovieReview object. This method also calls the method classifyReview to predict the polarity of the review.
      Specified by:
      readReview in class assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Parameters:
      reviewFilePath - A path to a .txt file containing a review.
      realClass - The real class entered by the user.
      Returns:
      a MovieReview object.

    • searchById

      public assignment2.MovieReview searchById​(int id)
      Description copied from class: assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Searches the review database by id.
      Specified by:
      searchById in class assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler
      Parameters:
      id - The id to search for.
      Returns:
      The review that matches the given id or null if the id does not exist in the database.

    • searchBySubstring

      public java.util.List<assignment2.MovieReview> searchBySubstring​(java.lang.String substring)
      Description copied from class: assignment2.AbstractReviewHandler

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
